I live in Australia & our Summers are getting drier & nastier. The last bushfires were horrific & unprecedented. The problem with the human race is we are controlled by the selfish, wealthy & powerful who only care about themselves & the now. It’s always the next generations problem to solve. Self interest is always paramount. This is getting desperate & becoming more real for most because now it’s your recently born children who will suffer the consequences of our inaction. I watch these videos & it just breaks my heart. What are we leaving behind for our children?
